creator: mhudson@blueprinttech.com
text:
The actual problem is located at line 256 of StatefulEJBProvider.java.

It originally said:

methodName = origCall.getMethodName();

It should be:

this.methodName = origCall.getMethodName();

Basically the same variable name was used for a parameter passed
into the locate() method as a class variable in the object itself. 

NOTE:  There is no bug form for the SOAP product, so since perusing the current 
buglist it seemed that other SOAP related issues were being passed to XercesJ 
product... so I put it here, if there's a better place please inform. Thanks.
